definition: the tone of a school/campus atmosphere

sentences.english: Encourage teachers and students" participation and stimulate the establishment of campus culture by excellent school spirit."
sentences.chinese: 鼓励师生参与，以优良校风来促进校园文化建设。

sentences.english: School spirit positive, and together we create a harmonious education atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 校风积极向上，和我们一起打造了和谐的教育氛围。

sentences.english: A basic conflict between the ethos and system has weakened the Indian polity.
sentences.chinese: 一个之间的校风和系统的基本冲突削弱了印度的政体。

sentences.english: The style of study is an important part of school spirit.
sentences.chinese: 学风是校风的一个重要组成部分。

sentences.english: I love the new campus good style of study, school spirit.
sentences.chinese: 我爱新校园里良好的学风，校风。

sentences.english: Also it is the important means to set up good school spirit.
sentences.chinese: 也是树立良好校风的重要手段。

sentences.english: School, teaching quality, who can tell me.
sentences.chinese: 校风，教学质量，谁能告诉我。

definition: style of study/academic atmosphere/school discipline/school traditions
diligent and sociable (idiom); meticulous in work and dealing cheerfully with one's colleagues
to carry out (obligation) conscientiously/to behave sincerely
to serve as a model for others (idiom)/to be a worthy teacher
